pr_title: Use different tool to convert Go test output to XML

timeline.message: chore(project): use gotestsum to convert test output to XML

timeline.author: npepinpe

timeline.bodyText: we split it then rejoin it? can't we just to log[8:]? we just want to remove the first 8 bytes right?
timeline.author: npepinpe

replies.bodyText: That would remove the first 8 bytes in the entire log, leaving the headers in the other lines no?
replies.author: MiguelPires
